features: Vintage inspiration: The iconic Salomon World Champion graphics add a vintage twist to this understated crewneck
Everyday comfort: Simple yet comfy with no itchy label, this sweatshirt will quickly become a wardrobe essential
Organic cotton: Sourced in Turkey to limit its footprint, the soft cotton is 100% organic
Regular fit: On tops and bottoms, Regular fit is a wider fir than active fit, but slimmer than relaxed fit
